english_translation: Biographical entry: Reported from him by Urwah ibn al-Zubayr. His kunyah (patronymic) is Abu al-Ala, named so by Yahya. He is counted among the people of Madinah. Ali ibn Abdullah said to me: He is my grandfather from my mother's side; my mother is the daughter of Abbas ibn Jumhan. Ali said: I thought he was from the captives (slaves taken in battle), and I did not think he was the one from whom Musa ibn Ubaydah reported.

english_translation: From Aisha: The Prophet ﷺ recited: 'Indeed it is a deed that is not righteous.' Malik ibn Ismail said to us: From Ibrahim ibn al-Zurqan, from Abu Ruwayq, from Muhammad ibn Juhada, from his father. And Sulayman ibn Harb said: Hammad narrated to us, he said: Muhammad ibn Juhada narrated to us, saying: My father died on the road to Makkah, then Talhah ibn Masruf came to us to console us.
